Traits.Name: Static Distortion
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Blackout Static must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Voice Steal
Traits.Content: Creatures within 15 feet of the Blackout Static cannot use verbal components for spells.

Actions.Name: Static Surge
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, has a reach of 10 ft., and targets one creature. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn, as the wave of static disrupts its nervous system.

Actions.Name: Disruptive Pulse
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 20 (4d8 + 4) force damage. The Blackout Static emits a pulse of distorted energy that travels up to 120 feet and explodes in a burst of static noise. All creatures within a 10-foot radius of the point of impact must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking half damage on a success. On a failure, they also suffer the 'Deafened' condition until the end of their next turn. Recharge 5-6.

Actions.Name: Echoing Wail
Actions.Content: The Blackout Static unleashes a haunting distortion of sound. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage and is frightened until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is not frightened. The Blackout Staticâ€™s eerie wails seem to resonate with the deepest fears of its victims. Recharge 6.
